name: venvdiff
body:
# venvdiff

just a little shell script to diff the output from multiple `pip freeze` commands from within multiple virtualenvs in [vim's](http://www.vim.org/) delightful `vimdiff` shortcut.

# install
    curl https://raw.github.com/bmcorser/venvdiff/master/venvdiff.sh > ~/bin/venvdiff && chmod 0755 !#:3
## requirements
 * zsh
 * vim
 * `~/bin/` created and added to `$PATH`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: use vimdiff and virtualenvwrapper to run a diff on up to four virtualenvs
